Description: Manage fleets of SageMaker notebook instances through AWS Systems Manage and Cognito single sign on

CidrBlock.Description: CIDR block to use for the VPC. choose carefully if you are going to peer the VPC in this stack with another one

AdminEmail.Description: will be used to setup initial password to log into admin interface

AdminPhoneNumber.ConstraintDescription: must be in a format like +18005550100
AdminPhoneNumber.Description: Admin Phone Number used for multi factor authentication

VPCEndpoints.Description: Enable or Disable creation of VPC endpoints. You must enable endpoints if you want to disable direct internet access to notebook instances

application/json.Fn::Sub:
#set($inputRoot = $input.path('$'))
#if ($input.params('type') == 'groups'  ||
    $input.params('type') == 'users'    ||
    $input.params('type') == 'instances')
{
    #if ($input.params('type') == 'groups')
        "FunctionName":"${APICloudDirectoryObjectCreateLambda.Arn}",
    #elseif ($input.params('type') == 'users')
        "FunctionName":"${APIUserCreateLambda.Arn}",
    #else 
        "FunctionName":"${APIInstanceCreateLambda.Arn}",
    #end
    "Payload":{
        "FunctionName":"${APICloudDirectoryObjectCreateLambda.Arn}",
        "UserPool":"${QNA.Outputs.UserPool}",
        "Type":"$input.params('type')",
        "Attributes":$input.json('$.template.data')
    }
}
#else
{
    "FunctionName":"${APIFailLambda.Arn}",
    "Payload":{
        "type":"[NotFound]",
        "message":"$input.params('type') is not a valid type, allowed values are 'groups','instances', or 'users'"
    }
}
#end

#set($inputRoot = $input.path('$'))
#set ( $root="https://${!context.apiId}.execute-api.${AWS::Region}.amazonaws.com/${!context.stage}")
#set ( $base="https://${!context.apiId}.execute-api.${AWS::Region}.amazonaws.com$inputRoot.path" )
{
    "collection":{
        "version":"1.0",
        #if ( $inputRoot.PrevToken )
            "href":"$base",
        #else
            "href":"$base?NextToken=$inputRoot.PrevToken",
        #end
        "links":[
            #if ( $inputRoot.NextToken )
            #else
                {"rel":"next","href":"$base?NextToken=$inputRoot.NextToken"}
            #end
        ],
        "items":[
            #foreach( $object in $inputRoot.Links)
                {
                #if ($input.path('$.ChildrenOrParents')=="children")
                    "href":"$base/$object.TargetObjectReference.Selector.substring(1)"
                #else
                    "href":"$base/$object.SourceObjectReference.Selector.substring(1)"
                #end
                #if ($object.direct)
                    ,"rel":"attachment"
                #end
                }#if( $foreach.hasNext ),#end
            #end
        ],
        "queries":[
            #if ( $inputRoot.search=="true"){
                #if ( $inputRoot.NextToken )
                    "href":"$base?",
                #else
                    "href":"$base?NextToken=$inputRoot.NextToken",
                #end
                "rel":"search",
                #if ($input.path('$.ChildrenOrParents')=="children")
                    "prompt":"Search for attached $input.path('$.TargetType') by ID",
                #elseif  ($input.path('$.ChildrenOrParents')=="parents")
                    "prompt":"Search for parent $input.path('$.SourceType') by ID",
                #end 
                "data":[
                    {"name":"MaxResults","prompt":"Maximum results to return"}
                ]
            }#end
        ],
        "template":{
            "data":{
                "schema":{
                #if ($input.path('$.ChildrenOrParents')=="children")
                    "href":"$root/templates/attachments?SourceType=$input.path('$.SourceType')&SourceID=$input.path('$.ID')&DestType=$input.path('$.TargetType')&Relationship=$input.path('$.ChildrenOrParents')"
                #else 
                    "href":"$root/templates/attachments?SourceType=$input.path('$.TargetType')&SourceID=$input.path('$.ID')&DestType=$input.path('$.SourceType')&Relationship=$input.path('$.ChildrenOrParents')"
                #end
                }
                #if ($input.path('$.ChildrenOrParents')=="children")
                    ,"prompt":"attach $input.path('$.TypeType')"
                #elseif  ($input.path('$.ChildrenOrParents')=="parents")
                    ,"prompt":"attach $input.path('$.SourceType')"
                #end
            }
        }
    }
}

text/html.Fn::Sub:
#if( $input.params('view') == 'admin' ) SageGuard Administration #else SageGuard User #end
#if( $input.params('view') == 'admin' ) #end

Properties.Description: An Api interface for SageMaker Build

EmailMessage.Fn::Sub:
Hello {username},

Welcome to SageGuard, your temporary password is:

{####}

Please go to the following link to log in and access your SageMaker Notebook Instances!

${URLs.UserLogin}

Happy to help,

SageGuard

Properties.SmsAuthenticationMessage: {####} is your authentication code for SageGuard

EmailMessageByLink.Fn::Sub:
Hello {username},

Please follow the link below to verify your email address:

{##Verify Email##}

Happy to help,

SageGuard
